cause.description: Asian Young Life is a Christian organization committed to making a difference in the lives of Asian American teenagers. Our leaders are caring adults who go where Asian kids are in order to build genuine friendships with them and earn the right to make a positive impact on their lives. If you are an adult and would like to make a financial contribution to Asian Young Life, please go to the Donors Page on our website to make a donation. (Please do NOT donate through the "Causes" application here. Contributions made through "Causes" do not go directly to Asian Young Life.) If you would like to assist Asian Young Life by serving as a volunteer leader, please go to our Leaders Information Page to learn more. If you haven't already done so, please be sure to join our Asian Young Life Facebook Group or visit us online at asian.younglife.org. Thank you for your interest in our organization! 1. Every Asian American teenager should have the opportunity to meet Jesus Christ and follow Him.
cause.mission: Making a difference in the lives of Asian American teenagers.
cause.name: Asian Young Life
